backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, favorites, and multi-playlist management with access control checks for all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing styling, hooks, components, and playlist features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and applying theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting PWA metadata, manifest links, and icons for the app shell.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, appearance, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching static assets, cleaning old caches, and serving files offline with network fallback logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring header, player, library, profile setup, authentication checks, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGateNot: UI notice prompting unauthenticated users to sign in to access specific features.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for firstâ€‘time profile creation with name input and profile saving.
frontend/src/components/header/Header.ts: Renders the app header with title, install button, login button, and optional user name.
frontend/src/components/layout/SectionCa: A simple styled container wrapper for grouping UI sections.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryS: Manages track ordering, playlists, favorites, and migration logic, rendering the main library view.
frontend/src/components/library/Playlist: Provides UI and logic for creating, selecting, renaming, and deleting playlists.
Displays up/down controls to reorder playlist tracks.
frontend/src/components/library/TrackRow: Renders an individual track row with play, favorite, and playlist controls.
frontend/src/components/player/PlaybackM: Buttons to toggle shuffle and repeat playback modes.
frontend/src/components/player/PlayerSec: Displays the audio player UI with transport controls, seek bar, volume, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppEn: Shows a PWA install button and instructions when installable and not yet installed.
frontend/src/config/canisterResolution.t: Resolves backend canister configuration based on environment, supporting production and local IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Implements a full audio player hook with play controls, track loading, progress, volume, shuffle, repeat modes, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, tracks installation state, and exposes a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, favorites, and playlists using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus custom utility patterns.
frontend/src/lib/tracks.ts: Defines track types, sample track data, and helpers for fetching and formatting track info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, extended typography, animations, spacing, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current build state, goals, issues, and feature list for a Nothing-style music player app with backend persistence and multi-playlist support.
